meanings.definition: The quality or state of being broad.
meanings.sent1: The broadness of the field made it perfect for playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: She admired the broadness of the river as it flowed gently.
meanings.sent3: The broadness of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: His ideas had a broadness that encompassed all aspects of the project.
meanings.sent5: The broadness of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The extent or distance from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The broadness of the table allowed for many guests to sit around it.
meanings.sent2: He measured the broadness of the room before deciding on the furniture layout.
meanings.sent3: The broadness of the pizza surprised the hungry group of friends.
meanings.sent4: The broadness of the smile on her face showed her genuine happiness.
meanings.sent5: The broadness of the road made it easy for two cars to pass each other.

meanings.definition: The range or scope of something.
meanings.sent1: The broadness of his knowledge impressed the professors.
meanings.sent2: She explored the broadness of the topic in her research paper.
meanings.sent3: The broadness of the joke made everyone in the room laugh.
meanings.sent4: The broadness of opportunities in the city excited the young entrepreneur.
meanings.sent5: The broadness of the ocean's horizon filled her with a sense of wonder.
